script: I totally misjudged how bad the traffic was going to be today. It took me almost an hour just to get across town. Next time, I will definitely make sure to leave a bit earlier. Being stuck in a car that long is incredibly frustrating.

options: To indicate how they plan to avoid repeating this specific mistake in the future.
To angrily complain that other drivers are too slow.
To explicitly brag about having a very fast car.

explanation: The speaker uses 'Next time' to show they have learned from a negative experience and intend to change their future behavior.
